pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Prevent interaction with models apart from the one being edited

content.raw:
Follow these steps:

1. Select a model

1. Edit->Model Editor

1. Edit->Building Editor

1. Exit building editor

Problem 1: The model that was selected no longer has it's bounding box visible, but it is still selected in the World Tree.

Problem 2: I have to select Edit->Model Editor twice to re-open the model editor.
content.html:
Follow these steps:

  1. Select a model

  2. Edit->Model Editor

  3. Edit->Building Editor

  4. Exit building editor

Problem 1: The model that was selected no longer has it's bounding box visible, but it is still selected in the World Tree.

Problem 2: I have to select Edit->Model Editor twice to re-open the model editor.
